text: ayana (allah): "O adam! Viti (i vastuvula) perlanu viriki telupu." Ani annadu. Epudaite atanu (adam) a vastuvula perlanu variki telipado; ayana annadu: "Niscayanga, nenu matrame bhumyakasala agocara visayalanu erugudunani mito ceppaleda? Mariyu miru edi bahirgatam cestaro mariyu edi dastaro kuda naku baga telusu
